resources.string: The witch has made a lot of things for Halloween. Catch as most things as you can. But... Remember not everything you see is good for you.
Some candies are hidden in the forest. Now you need to find them out and bring to the pupmkin house. Be careful of the blackghost!
As night falls, the bats find our goods and want to occupy them.Shoot them by using the candy bullet! To win the game, we have to kill 15 bats.Hurry up! It is our final battle!
